metadata.title: CVE-2015-9268 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Nullsoft Scriptable Install System (NSIS) before 2.49 has unsafe implicitlinking against Version.dll. In other words, there is no protectionmechanism in which a wrapper function resolves the dependency at anappropriate time during runtime.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-9268` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

nsis - 2.50-1
nsis-common - 2.50-1
nsis-pluginapi - 2.50-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nsis package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.50-1').
